name: Waldek Technologies
description: Waldek Technologies is developing Gauzilla Pro, the #1 AI-powered & no-code web editor for 3D/4D digital twins. Gauzilla utilizes the latest radiance field technology and serverless edge-AI that runs directly in a web browser.
one_liner: Waldek Technologies is developing Gauzilla Pro, the #1 AI-powered & no-code web editor for 3D/4D digital twins. Gauzilla utilizes the latest radiance field technology and serverless edge-AI that runs directly in a web browser.
